item.description:
Join Robyn Laing for this annual event. Last year was great! It's a good way to try out different wines that you probably would never have a chance to try otherwise.

Price
$85 for Saturday only if purchased before January 17th.
$95 for Saturday only if purchased after January 17th or at the door.

SPECIAL HOLIDAY OFFER ENDS Monday, December 8
to receive a limited edition, Boston Wine Expo apron. Use Promo
Code HDAP7 to qualify for this special offer.

There's a $2.50 service charge for purchasing tickets online. The website also lists several local liquor stores that are selling tickets.

Here's the link to the Boston Wine Expo website: Boston Wine Expo
item.name: 18th Annual Boston Wine Expo
